Design Tip Tuesday ✨ If you want your room to feel taller and more refined, try hanging your drapery higher. Raising the eyeline creates beautiful visual height and instantly gives the space an airy, architectural elegance—especially when paired with tailored shades. At Gotcha Covered, we help you choose custom window treatments that enhance your home’s natural proportions and complement your personal style—and we’d love to show you what’s possible for your space.
